review.title: “Disappointed by management and would not recommend”
review.pros: Pros – Benefits are just OK, health insurance coverage is fair but expensive.Shop Foreman been there a long time, helpful and fun to work with.Free lunch on saturdays
review.cons: Cons – Vacation time is worthless. Management will not allow time off unless YOU find someone to cover each day you will miss. That usually includes working for someone on your scheduled day off. So in a sense, no vacation time!Store manager will change work times whenever she wants, that includes working late or on days off. But there is exactly ZERO paid overtime. Little or no mercy for outside personal commitments.Flat rate labor rates are very low for area, does not matter what certifications you possess.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Show more respect for employees personal lives and interests. This includes respecting their life outside of work!If you are going to charge over $100 an hour for labor, pay your mechanics more!
